column2: title=An Edition of ''Þe Liflade ant te Passiun of Seinte Iuliene''

publisher=<small>Liége/Paris: Bibliothéque de la Faculté de Philosphie et Lettres de l'Université de Liége (Fasc. LXIV) Faculté de Philosphie et Lettres / Librarie E. Droz; Printed at the University Press, Oxford</small>

column1: '''''An Edition of Þe Liflade ant te Passiun of Seinte Iuliene''''' ("An Edition of The Life and the Passion of Saint Juliana") is the published thesis of [[Simonne d'Ardenne
column2: S.T.R.O. d'Ardenne]], who wrote the thesis under the supervision of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The book is dedicated to Tolkien, who is also is also acknowledged by d'Ardenne in the prefatory note: "''I am deeply indebted for assistance from the beginning of my work on this text, and especially during the revision of the glossary and grammar.''" D'Ardenne admitted in private correspondence that Tolkien should have been credited as a joint editor.<ref>{{CG
column3: RG}}, p. 202</ref><ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=13860 An Edition of Þe Liflade ant te Passiun of Seinte Iuliene] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 7 April 2011)</ref>
